title: trading.ctj
author: trading.ctj
content: Hello Bitcoin Talk Community,We are excited to announce the launch of Crypto Trade Journal - the ultimate online trading journal for cryptocurrency traders.At Crypto Trade Journal, we understand the importance of tracking, analyzing, and sharing trades to help traders find their edge and achieve consistent results. That's why we've created a comprehensive online platform to help traders do just that.With our platform, traders can easily track their trades, analyze their performance, and share their trades with others to get feedback and find new trading strategies. We've made it simple to use and accessible from anywhere, so traders can focus on what's important - their trades.In addition to tracking and analyzing trades, we also provide traders with a range of tools and resources to help them improve their trading skills, including market insights, trading strategy guides, and more.We are confident that Crypto Trade Journal will become a valuable tool for all cryptocurrency traders and look forward to building a community of traders who can help each other achieve success.If you're interested in learning more, please visit our website at https://www.cryptotradejournal.net/. We look forward to hearing your thoughts and feedback.Best regards,The Crypto Trade Journal Teamhttps://cryptotradejournal.nethello@cryptotradejournal.net

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: @trading.ctjI only had a quick glance at its free version and despite seeing that most of the features can only be accessed in the pro version, it looks promising.It'd be nice to have an option to manually type the names of the exchanges we use and have them as an option in the exchange field of the "add trade" page.On the same page, there's a description field under the "additional information" part, and since we can add notes after adding a trade, I don't think there's a need for the description part.

comments.author: trading.ctj
comments.body: Hello all,We released a new version, check out our changelog:Added Calendar StatRedesigned DashboardAdded Emotions On TradeAdded Risk Threshold On TradeFixed Reported/Found BugsImplemented feedback from customersEnhanced Trade Tags LibraryAdded New Information On Trade Single PageEnhanced Filters On the Dashboard

comments.author: trading.ctj
comments.body: Hello all,We released a new version, check out our changelog:Implemented an Affiliate Program to help users earn commissions by referring others to the platform.Added two new statistics, Trade Expectancy and Average Trade Cost, to provide users with more insights into their trading performance.Enhanced the design of the Dashboard, making it more visually appealing and user-friendly.Implemented a Rich Editor for Trade Notes, allowing users to add formatting and styling to their notes.Added an Open Positions table to the dashboard, enabling users to view all their current trades in one place.Fixed various reported bugs and issues to improve overall platform stability and performance.Improved the Payment Print Design for a more professional and polished look.

comments.author: trading.ctj
comments.body: Hello all,We released a new version, check out our changelog:Added a 7-day free trial option to enjoy premium features.Added the recover password option to allow users to reset their password easily.Added a new report that identifies the type of trader based on the user's trading patterns (e.g., scalper, swing trader).Enhanced the design of charts to improve readability and user experience.Optimized and improved the filters on the dashboard for faster and more accurate data retrieval.Fixed various reported bugs and issues to improve overall platform stability and performance.
